name: Off The Road Unleashed
overview: Immerse yourself in realistic sandbox environments all filled with challenging tasks and collectables. Sand dunes, frozen plains, mountains to climb and conquer. Explore 5 worlds with your favorite vehicle or just take a hike on foot! • 5 worlds to explore • Drive big rigs, 4x4 or rally cars • Car customization • Up to 32 vehicles to unlock and drive • Pilot helicopters, airplanes, boats! • Tons of challenges to complete • Construct your world, build bridges, emerge buildings! • Use your winch to climb steep hills! Tons of challenges are waiting for you to beat. From transport tasks to racing against opponents, you choose!
